import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

%matplotlib inline
source.48bfee68:
for entity in data['entity'].unique():
    tmp = data[data['entity']==entity]
    size_ = len(tmp['indicator'].unique())
    cols,rows = 4,(size_//4)+(1 if size_%4!=0 else 0)
    
    fig,axs = plt.subplots(rows,cols,figsize=(25,5*rows))
    fig.suptitle(entity)
    for i,ind in enumerate(tmp['indicator'].unique()):
        sns.lineplot(data=tmp[tmp['indicator']==ind], x="date", y="value", ax=axs[i] if rows<=1 else axs[i//4][i%4])
        (axs[i] if rows<=1 else axs[i//4][i%4]).set_title(ind)
    plt.show()
